Name: Aura of Alacrity
Description: Aura 1. Allies in the aura can use the charged effects of abilities even on normal turns.

Name: Barely There
Description: Spriggs are intangible and don't cause engagement. Characters can't collide with them and can share their space. They disappear when combat ends, or all other non-sprigg allies have been defeated.

Name: Bloom
Description: At the start of its turns, the beast creates a height 3 blooming tree object adjacent to it.

Name: Deep Rooted
Description: At the start of any combat, place 4 deep roots on the map, which are size 1 summons that cannot be moved in any way. The roots have aura 1. Foes in the aura are vulnerable+. All roots must be accessible to characters and placed within range 6 of another root. The Roots are considered to be the Wissan for purposes of targeting and each has 25% of its max hp. When a root is destroyed, remove it.

Name: Drag Under (Carp)
Description: When this Hob ends its turn, it can choose an adjacent foe, which must save. On a failed save, that foe takes [D]+[fray], and remove both the Hob and that foe from play as they dive into a pool of magicked water. Both return to play at the start of that foe's next turn, in any free space in range 3 of their original location.

Name: Mist Form
Description: The Hob is a character and also a space of dangerous and difficult terrain. Characters can share space with it, and it has resistance against any character inside of its space.

Actions.Name: Spirit Away
Actions.Description: The Hob swaps places with an adjacent character, teleporting both. If either character cannot teleport, this move cannot be made.

Name: Thicket Dance
Description: At the start of its turn, before any delay effects activate, the Mayfly spirit and all characters in range 2 teleport 1 space in a direction of the spirit's choice. Foes can save to avoid this effect.

Name: Tied to the Tree
Description: The Wissan's body is immune to all damage. When all four roots are destroyed, it is instantly defeated and disappears. It can teleport to any space adjacent to a root as a free action.

Name: Trickery
Description: Like player characters, Hobs have charge abilities and can take slow turns.

Name: Wild Hunt
Description: At the start of the round, the beast can choose an edge of the map. At the end of that round, a huge stampede of animals sweeps across the map from that end to the next.

ListedItems.Description: Repeat this effect 3 times on all foes.

CustomComponents.Name: Effect
CustomComponents.Description: Foe takes 1 damage and are shoved 1 in the direciton of the herd.

ListedItems.Description: Characters that are standing on the other side of objects or terrain as if they were in cover from this effect are immune to it.
